name: @varlabs/ai
description: AI sdk for interfacing with AI models
author: HamzaKV <hamzakv333@gmail.com>

scripts.build: pnpm run clean && tsc && pnpm run copy-files:root
scripts.patch: pnpm run git:main && npm version patch && pnpm run git:push:main
scripts.minor: pnpm run git:main && npm version minor && pnpm run git:push:main
scripts.major: pnpm run git:main && npm version major && pnpm run git:push:main
scripts.roll: pnpm run build && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.roll:patch: pnpm run patch && pnpm run roll
scripts.roll:minor: pnpm run minor && pnpm run roll
scripts.roll:major: pnpm run major && pnpm run roll
